statements: SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT item_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_date, item_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_id, item_name, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, item_name FROM sales WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%'
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales
SELECT item_name, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales GROUP BY item_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE DATE_PART('month', sale_date) = 1
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT sale_id, sale_price FROM sales WHERE menu_item_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM menu_items WHERE menu_item_id = 2;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM menu_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_price > 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, item_name FROM sales JOIN menu_items ON sales.menu_item_id = menu_items.menu_item_id WHERE item_category = 'Beverages'
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sale_price < 100 ORDER BY sale_id ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_price, item_category FROM sales JOIN menu_items ON sales.menu_item_id = menu_items.menu_item_id WHERE sale_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, item_name, item_category FROM sales JOIN menu_items ON sales.menu_item_id = menu_items.menu_item_id ORDER BY sale_price DESC,sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM menu_items WHERE item_price > 20;
SELECT item_name, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, total_sales FROM popular_items WHERE total_sales < 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, item_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM menu_items ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, total_price FROM sales JOIN menu_items ON sales.item_id = menu_items.item_id WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, total_sales FROM popular_items WHERE total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC, item_name ASC;

SELECT menu_items.item_name, sales.quantity, popular_items.total_sales FROM menu_items JOIN sales ON menu_items.item_id = sales.item_id JOIN popular_items ON menu_items.item_id = popular_items.item_id WHERE sales.quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, menu_item_id, order_id, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE menu_item_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT item_name, price FROM MenuItems ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Sales JOIN Orders ON Sales.order_id = Orders.order_id WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT customer_name, item_name, price FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Sales ON Orders.order_id = Sales.order_id JOIN MenuItems ON Sales.menu_item_id = MenuItems.menu_item_id
SELECT item_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM MenuItems JOIN Sales ON MenuItems.menu_item_id = Sales.menu_item_id GROUP BY item_name
SELECT customer_name, address, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, address

SELECT customer_name, item_name, sale_date FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Sales ON Orders.order_id = Sales.order_id JOIN MenuItems ON Sales.menu_item_id = MenuItems.menu_item_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, price, quantity, unit_price FROM menu_items JOIN order_items ON menu_items.item_id = order_items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM menu_items JOIN order_items ON menu_items.item_id = order_items.item_id GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT menu_items.item_id, menu_items.item_name, order_items.order_id, order_items.quantity FROM menu_items JOIN order_items ON menu_items.item_id = order_items.item_id ORDER BY order_items.quantity DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT menu_items.item_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM menu_items JOIN order_items ON menu_items.item_id = order_items.item_id JOIN orders ON order_items.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;
